title: Multi-Agentic Hackathon Optimization
description: A collaborative AI interface built in under 48 hours using Azure AI Foundry to streamline survey generation, outreach personalization, and insight synthesis.
features: Won 3 of 5 awards: Best Overall Agentic AI Solution, Best Implementation Potential, and Audience Favorite
Competed against six teams to showcase integration of agentic LLMs as collaborative problem-solvers and workflow accelerators
Built a multi-agent interface enabling intelligent collaboration between user and AI agents
Developed agents for personalized messaging, dynamic form generation, and feedback-driven insights

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, fully responsive developer portfolio built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, featuring project showcases, a contact form, dark mode, and security best practices.
features: Secure contact form with CAPTCHA and rate limiting (anticipated)
Dynamic project content powered by JSON
Deployed on Vercel with CI/CD pipeline (anticipated)
Uses Shadcn UI components with theme support
Dark mode and custom color theme

title: Student Course Registration System
description: A web-based platform built with Django to streamline course registration and management for students, faculty, and administrators.
features: Student course registration and progress tracking
Admin dashboard with semester scheduling and course overrides
